name: Buffalo Dip
author: MothertoMonsters
summary: Always a hit, for any occasion. Garnish as desired. Serve with crackers or vegetables.
ingredients: ½ cup ranch salad dressing, or to taste
½ cup Buffalo wing sauce (such as Sweet Baby Ray's®)
½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese, or to taste
2 (12.5 fl oz) cans chicken chunks, drained
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Beat cream cheese in a deep baking dish until smooth
Add ranch dressing, Buffalo wing sauce, and mozzarella cheese to cream cheese and stir until smooth
Bake in the preheated oven until heated through and bubbling, about 20 minutes
